import React, { Component } from 'react'; class ComposeMessageComponent extends Component { render() { const { display, addMessage } = this.props const sendMessage = e => { e.preventDefault() const subject = document.querySelector('#subject') const body = document.querySelector('#body') addMessage({ subject: subject.value, body: body.value }) subject.value = '' body.value = '' } return (

Compose Message

); } } export default ComposeMessageComponent;
